House passage puts the onus on the Senate. And last time I checked, you've got about two dozen members of the Democratic majority in the Senate who are up for election in two years. As the American people engage on this issue, I like our chances. In the meantime, Republicans, Mike Pence says, will use the "power of the purse" to block Obamacare's implementation.
